title: Here's What Happened
body:
I broke up with HT6, said I wanted to be friends & take it slowly.

HT6 thought GLG was seducing me for God knows what reason.

HT6 posted bad stuff about GLG to her club chat and to a bunch of random people.

HT6's cronies posted the stuff to GD.

Now please stop messaging me asking what happened. It's difficult enough trying to fix it.
